entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
